src:
Pesan Iwan Bule untuk Timnas Indonesia U-23 Sebelum Tampil di SEA Games 2019
06 Nov 2019, 18:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-23 sebentar lagi akan berlaga di SEA Games 2019. Pesta olahraga antarnegara Asia Tenggara itu bakal berlangsung di Manila, Filipina, pada 30 November-10 Desember mendatang.
Beberapa pekan sebelum tampil pada perhelatan tersebut, Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan melakukan pertemuan dengan staf pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-23 beserta jajaran pemain. Tatap muka tersebut berlangsung di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11).
Pada pertemuan tersebut, banyak pesan yang disampaikan Iwan Bule, sapaan akrab Mochamad Iriawan kepada skuat Garuda Muda. Satu di antaranya ialah untuk terus serius berlatih.
"Timnas Indonesia U-23 itu pertama kan anak-anak saya, umur mereka adalah di bawah 23. Hanya satu aja ya, sehingga saya berpesan sebagai ayah, sebagai orang tua, mereka fokus hanya pertama sekarang latihan latihan latihan dan latihan, fokus," ujar Iwan Bule.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Iwan Bule's message to the Indonesian U-23 national team before appearing in the 2019 SEA Games
Nov 6 2019, 18:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesia U-23 national team will soon be competing at the 2019 SEA Games. The Games between Southeast Asian countries will take place in Manila, Philippines, on 30 November-10 December.
A few weeks before appearing at the event, PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan, held a meeting with the U-23 Indonesian National Team coaching staff along with the ranks of players. The face-to-face meeting took place at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11).
At the meeting, many messages were delivered by Iwan Bule, Mochamad Iriawan's familiar greeting to the Garuda Muda squad. One of them is to continue to seriously practice.
"The Indonesian U-23 national team is my children first, their age is under 23. Just one, so I advised as a father, as parents, they focus only first now on training exercises and exercises, focus," said Iwan Bule.

Read the next page, Bolaneters.
